text: İsmet Kaya Erdem (born 1928) is a Turkish politician. He was the Minister of Finance from 1980 to 1982. He also was the Speaker of the Grand National Assembly from 1989 to 1991. Erdem was born in Karabük, Turkey. He was a member of the Motherland Party. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Speakers of the Parliament of Turkey
title: Kaya Erdem
